text:
@EricTrump @realDonaldTrump Daddy and his boys do not get to set the rules for journalistic integrity for VERY good reasons. 
For maybe the first time, the Media has made a decision not to allow the threat your father poses in the disinformation he spouts from actually causing harm. https://t.co/YzzSBYXNvP
